title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<dyn Any>', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust &wgpu::SurfaceConfiguration{ usage: wgpu::TextureUsages::RENDER_ATTACHMENT, format: surface.get_preferred_format( &adapter ).expect("Could not get_preferred_format"), present_mode: wgpu::PresentMode::Fifo, ..window.inner_size() // <--- This line breaks rc } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (686e313a9 2021-11-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 686e313a9aa14107c8631ffe48fa09110a7692db commit-date: 2021-11-27 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/check/fn_ctxt/_impl.rs:319:25: while adjusting Expr { hir_id: HirId { owner: DefId(0:21 ~ deer[2758]::main), local_id: 457 }, kind: Path(Resolved(None, Path { span: src/main.rs:117:9: 117:15 (#0), res: Local(HirId { owner: DefId(0:21 ~ deer[2758]::main), local_id: 23 }), segments: [PathSegment { ident: window#0, hir_id: Some(HirId { owner: DefId(0:21 ~ deer[2758]::main), local_id: 456 }), res: Some(Local(HirId { owner: DefId(0:21 ~ deer[2758]::main), local_id: 23 })), args: None, infer_args: true }] })), span: src/main.rs:117:9: 117:15 (#0) }, can't compose [Borrow(Ref('_#136r, Not)) -> &Window] and [Borrow(Ref('_#138r, Not)) -> &Window] thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 ```
Backtrace
